Question: They arrested this person and brought him to a local jail while the Japanese government decided what to do.
Hints: In 1981, this person sang backup on Harrison's tribute to their ex-bandmate, "All Those Years Ago", which featured Starr on drums.
On his "Taxman" solo, this person commented, "I was very inspired by Jimi Hendrix.
In 1983, this person said, "I would not have been as typically human and standoffish as I was if I knew John was going to die.
